resources.string: The Ghost Hunter App is a simple game. Tilt your screen in order to move your character (at the bottom of the screen). Tap the screen to fire a bullet. Ghosts will begin to come from the top of the screen. Your objective is to shoot the ghosts before they are able to get to the bottom of the screen. If they make if to the bottom, you will lose one of your three lives. You lose once your three lives run out. You also lose if a ghost touches your character. Your score is based on the number of ghosts you shoot.
